AT.name: Castlevania Harmony of Dissonance
AT.description: 50 Jahre sind vergangen, seitdem Simon Belmont das Land von Draculas Fluch befreite. Jetzt muss sich Simons Nachfahre Juste erneut in das Schloss des Grafen wagen, um das rätselhafte Verschwinden eines Freundes aufzuklären. Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance führte die Zauberverbindung, bei der Zauber und Waffen miteinander verbunden werden, als neues Angriffssystem ein und vertiefte die Rollenspielerfahrung mit Elementen wie der Verbesserung deines Charakters. Selbstverständlich geht Juste ohne seinen treuen Vampirtöter nirgendwohin. Schwinge deine Peitsche, während du die verschlungenen Labyrinthe der Burg erkundest, und suche nach der Wahrheit, die in den Schatten lauert.

AU.name: Castlevania Harmony of Dissonance
AU.description: It has been 50 years since Simon Belmont saved the land from the curse of Dracula. Now, Simon's descendant Juste must venture into the count’s castle once more, to solve the mystery of a friend’s disappearance. Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance introduced the attack system Spell Fusion – combining spells and sub-weapons to create new attacks – and brought deeper RPG elements like levelling-up your character. Of course, Juste wouldn’t be without his trusty Vampire Killer. Wield your whip as you explore the labyrinthine castle, and seek out the truth that lurks in the shadows.

BG.name: Castlevania Harmony of Dissonance
BG.description: It has been 50 years since Simon Belmont saved the land from the curse of Dracula. Now, Simon's descendant Juste must venture into the count’s castle once more, to solve the mystery of a friend’s disappearance. Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance introduced the attack system Spell Fusion – combining spells and sub-weapons to create new attacks – and brought deeper RPG elements like levelling-up your character. Of course, Juste wouldn’t be without his trusty Vampire Killer. Wield your whip as you explore the labyrinthine castle, and seek out the truth that lurks in the shadows.

BE.name: Castlevania Harmony of Dissonance
BE.description: Cela fait 50 ans que Simon Belmont a sauvé le pays de la malédiction de Dracula. C'est maintenant à Juste, le descendant de Simon, de s'aventurer dans le château du comte pour retrouver son ami disparu. Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance dispose d'un système de fusion des sorts, permettant de créer de nouvelles attaques en associant sorts et armes secondaires, et bénéficie également d'éléments RPG telle que la progression de votre personnage. Vampire Killer, le fidèle compagnon de Juste, sera bien évidemment à ses côtés. Faites claquer votre fouet et percez le mystère qui se cache dans les ténèbres du château labyrinthique.

Of course, Juste wouldn’t be without his trusty Vampire Killer. Wield your whip as you explore the labyrinthine castle, and seek out the truth that lurks in the shadows.

ES.name: Castlevania Harmony of Dissonance
ES.description: Han pasado 50 años desde que Simon Belmont acabara con la maldición de Drácula. Ahora le toca a su descendiente Juste adentrarse de nuevo en el castillo del conde para resolver la misteriosa desaparición de un amigo. Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance presentó por primera vez el sistema ofensivo consistente en combinar conjuros y armas secundarias para crear nuevos ataques. Además, introdujo nuevos elementos RPG como, por ejemplo, la posibilidad de subir el nivel del personaje. Como no podía ser de otra forma, Juste lleva consigo su fiel látigo matavampiros para ayudarle en su misión. Ábrete paso por el intrincado castillo y descubre la verdad que se oculta en las sombras.

Of course, Juste wouldn’t be without his trusty Vampire Killer. Wield your whip as you explore the labyrinthine castle, and seek out the truth that lurks in the shadows.

IT.name: Castlevania Harmony of Dissonance
IT.description: Sono ormai passati 50 anni da quando Simon Belmont ha salvato il regno dalla maledizione di Dracula. Ora tocca al suo erede Juste avventurarsi nel castello per risolvere un altro mistero e salvare una fanciulla scomparsa. Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance introduce lo Spell Fusion, un sistema di attacco che combina incantesimi e armi secondarie, e arricchisce la meccanica di gioco di elementi RPG più intensi, come la possibilità di far salire di livello il tuo personaggio. Juste ha sempre con sé l'infallibile frusta "Ammazzavampiri", da schioccare contro i nemici che infestano il labirintico castello, alla ricerca della verità che si annida nell'ombra.

Of course, Juste wouldn’t be without his trusty Vampire Killer. Wield your whip as you explore the labyrinthine castle, and seek out the truth that lurks in the shadows.

NL.name: Castlevania Harmony of Dissonance
NL.description: Vijftig jaar geleden bevrijdde Simon Belmont het land van de vloek van Dracula. Nu moet Juste, nakomeling van Simon Belmont, opnieuw het kasteel betreden om het mysterie van een verdwenen vriend te ontrafelen. Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance introduceerde een aanvalssysteem dat magie en wapens combineerde en bood onder andere de mogelijkheid tot het versterken van je personage. Juste gaat niet op pad zonder zijn trouwe Vampire Killer. Klap je zweep, ontdek elke uithoek van het kasteel en leg de waarheid die in de schaduwen loert bloot.

NZ.name: Castlevania Harmony of Dissonance
NZ.description: It has been 50 years since Simon Belmont saved the land from the curse of Dracula. Now, Simon's descendant Juste must venture into the count’s castle once more, to solve the mystery of a friend’s disappearance. Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance introduced the attack system Spell Fusion – combining spells and sub-weapons to create new attacks – and brought deeper RPG elements like levelling-up your character. Of course, Juste wouldn’t be without his trusty Vampire Killer. Wield your whip as you explore the labyrinthine castle, and seek out the truth that lurks in the shadows.

PL.name: Castlevania Harmony of Dissonance
PL.description: It has been 50 years since Simon Belmont saved the land from the curse of Dracula. Now, Simon's descendant Juste must venture into the count’s castle once more, to solve the mystery of a friend’s disappearance. Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance introduced the attack system Spell Fusion – combining spells and sub-weapons to create new attacks – and brought deeper RPG elements like levelling-up your character. Of course, Juste wouldn’t be without his trusty Vampire Killer. Wield your whip as you explore the labyrinthine castle, and seek out the truth that lurks in the shadows.

PT.name: Castlevania Harmony of Dissonance
PT.description: Já passaram 50 anos desde que Simon Belmont salvou o reino da maldição de Dracula. Agora é a vez de Juste, descendente de Simon, se aventurar no castelo do conde para resolver o mistério do desaparecimento de um amigo. Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance introduziu o Spell Fusion, um sistema de ataque que combina feitiços e armas secundárias para criar novos ataques e intensificou a jogabilidade do RPG com novos elementos, como a possibilidade de melhorares o teu personagem. É claro que Juste se faz acompanhar do seu fiel Vampire Killer. Empunha o teu chicote à medida que exploras o castelo labiríntico e descobre a verdade que se esconde atrás das sombras.

RU.name: Castlevania Harmony of Dissonance
RU.description: Спустя 50 лет после того, как Simon Belmont освободил земли от бедствия по имени Дракула, его потомок Juste отправляется в замок темного графа на поиски своего исчезнувшего товарища. В игре Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance представлена новая система атаки Spell Fusion — сочетание магических заклинаний и различных видов оружия для создания новых видов атак. Также в эту версию привнесено больше элементов ролевой игры, в том числе возможность повышать уровень своего героя. Juste, конечно же, не отправился бы в путь, не имея при себе знаменитого фамильного кнута. С его помощью вам предстоит преодолеть запутанные лабиринты замка и отыскать правду, скрытую в его затаенных уголках!

SE.name: Castlevania Harmony of Dissonance
SE.description: It has been 50 years since Simon Belmont saved the land from the curse of Dracula. Now, Simon's descendant Juste must venture into the count’s castle once more, to solve the mystery of a friend’s disappearance.
